title.narrative: IN Swachh Bharat Mission Support Operation

description.narrative: This Operation provides support to the Swachh Bharat Mission – Gramin (SBM-G) national program, the new rural sanitation flagshipprogram launched by the Prime Minister in September, 2014. The Program Development Objective of the Swachh Bharat Mission Support Operation ( SBMSO) is to: to reduce open defecation in rural areas, and strengthen MDWS capacity to manage the national SBM-G program.

participating-org.narrative: International Bank for Reconstruction and Development
International Bank for Reconstruction and Development
